title: Watch: Varun, Alia set the festive mood with new Badrinath Ki Dulhania song | bollywood | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Watch: Varun, Alia set the festive mood with new Badrinath Ki Dulhania song 
The new song, Aashiq Surrender Hua, from the film Badrinath Ki Dulhania starring Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt, tries to catch the festive mood. bollywood Updated: Feb 24, 2017 19:01 IST Hindustan Times, New Delhi Badrinath Ki Dulhania will hit the screens on March 11, 2017. 
Varun Dhawan and Alia Bhatt’s Badrinath Ki Dulhania is fast turning out to be the film to watch out for in 2017. The songs and behind-the-scenes promo videos of the film has ensured there is enough buzz around it before the March 11 release. On Friday, another fun song from the film, Aashiq Surrender Hua, picturised on the lead pair, was revealed. 
Voiced by Amaal Malik and Shreya Ghosal, the song’s a clear attempt at targeting the festive mood around Holi. 
Composed by Amaal Malik, it reminds of old Govinda songs like ‘Main cycle se jaa raha tha’ and ‘Main paidal se jaa raha tha’. Though the film is directed by Shashank Khaitan, your won’t miss the David Dhawan touch it has got. 
This also gives Alia Bhatt a chance to display her dancing skills in an out and out commercial film. Read more
